snippet: Mitt Romney has revived his assertion that President Obama made the recession worse. Economists, the nonideological ones, disagree.
abstract: Mitt Romney has revived his assertion that President Obama made the recession worse. Economists, the nonideological ones, disagree.
lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney is back to saying that President Obama "made it worse" - the recession, that is - but his charge remains factually challenged.

headline.main: Fact Check: Romney on the Recession
